svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 30 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 30, 2023" date: "2023-09-29"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video. Recap by Tim Beiko.Â Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Devnet-9 using EIP4788 mainnet address & manual deployment and plan to test MEV-Boost;
KZG ceremony trusted setup expected next week EIP7514 (max churn limit) to be tested on short lived
devnet-10 with high number of validators EIP4788 (beacon root) issues fixed from 3 audits: 0 timestamp
& ring buffer size Discussion on proposed EIP7503 (onchain privacy via reminting burnt ETH)
Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video. Recap by Tim Beiko.Â Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim :
â€¢ Devnet-9 using EIP4788 mainnet address & manual deployment and plan to test MEV-Boost; KZG ceremony
trusted setup expected next week
Devnet-9 using EIP4788 mainnet address & manual deployment and plan to test MEV-Boost; KZG ceremony
â€¢ EIP7514 (max churn limit) to be tested on short lived devnet-10 with high number of validators
EIP7514 (max churn limit) to be tested on short lived devnet-10 with high number of validators
â€¢ EIP4788 (beacon root) issues fixed from 3 audits: 0 timestamp & ring buffer size
EIP4788 (beacon root) issues fixed from 3 audits: 0 timestamp & ring buffer size
â€¢ Discussion on proposed EIP7503 (onchain privacy via reminting burnt ETH)
Discussion on proposed EIP7503 (onchain privacy via reminting burnt ETH)
â€¢ Devnet-9 launched
Devnet-9 launched
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.23% far too close to risky 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.23% far too close to risky 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~80% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~80% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~80% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Need more geographic diversity for both stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Need more geographic diversity for both stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Layer 1
â€¢ 91% of blocks are via MEV-Boost relays controlled by just four entities
91% of blocks are via MEV-Boost relays controlled by just four entities
â€¢ Censorship dashboard : OFAC compliance of validators, relays & builders
Censorship dashboard : OFAC compliance of validators, relays & builders
â€¢ Mempool dumpster (transactions in Parquet & CSV): adds inclusion status & inclusion delay
Mempool dumpster (transactions in Parquet & CSV): adds inclusion status & inclusion delay
Client releases for HoleÅ¡ky testnet
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lighthouse v4.5.0 : experimental QUIC support Lodestar v1.11.3 Nimbus v23.9.1 Prysm
v4.1.0-alpha.1 Teku v23.9.1 : HoleÅ¡ky testnet requires GLIBC v2.34 on Linux
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Lighthouse v4.5.0 : experimental QUIC support
Lighthouse v4.5.0 : experimental QUIC support

Lodestar v1.11.3

Nimbus v23.9.1

Prysm v4.1.0-alpha.1

Teku v23.9.1 : HoleÅ¡ky testnet requires GLIBC v2.34 on Linux
â€¢ Execution layer: Besu v23.7.3 Erigon v2.49.3 : HoleÅ¡ky; v2.50.0 : implements Cancun EIPs Geth
v1.13.2 : fixes for path db storage schema corner cases Nethermind v1.21.0 : executable renaming,
throttling RPC calls, Trie recovery & sync time reduction Reth v0.1.0-alpha.9 : implements Cancun
EIPs, revm state handling API reworked and pruning improvements; v0.1.0-alpha.10 : HoleÅ¡ky
Execution layer:
â€¢ Besu v23.7.3
Besu v23.7.3
â€¢ Erigon v2.49.3 : HoleÅ¡ky; v2.50.0 : implements Cancun EIPs
Erigon v2.49.3 : HoleÅ¡ky; v2.50.0 : implements Cancun EIPs
â€¢ Geth v1.13.2 : fixes for path db storage schema corner cases
Geth v1.13.2 : fixes for path db storage schema corner cases
â€¢ Nethermind v1.21.0 : executable renaming, throttling RPC calls, Trie recovery & sync time reduction
Nethermind v1.21.0 : executable renaming, throttling RPC calls, Trie recovery & sync time reduction
â€¢ Reth v0.1.0-alpha.9 : implements Cancun EIPs, revm state handling API reworked and pruning
improvements; v0.1.0-alpha.10 : HoleÅ¡ky
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.9 : implements Cancun EIPs, revm state handling API reworked and pruning
Research
â€¢ Preparing for danksharding: data visualization on the propagation time of big blocks on mainnet
Preparing for danksharding: data visualization on the propagation time of big blocks on mainnet
â€¢ Relay-constructed inclusion list : proposal for censorship resistance in MEV-Boost
Relay-constructed inclusion list : proposal for censorship resistance in MEV-Boost
â€¢ Framework for design of optimal dynamic fees for multiple resources
Framework for design of optimal dynamic fees for multiple resources
Layer 2
â€¢ OP Stack: social decentralization & Fault Proof VM and dispute games
OP Stack: social decentralization & Fault Proof VM and dispute games
â€¢ Roll-op : script to configure & deploy OP Stack network
Roll-op : script to configure & deploy OP Stack network
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs EIP7525 : Expire state of the inactive accounts
EIPs
â€¢ EIP7525 : Expire state of the inactive accounts
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7524 : PLUME signature in wallets ERC7526 : Onchain NFT royalty
enforcement
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7524 : PLUME signature in wallets
ERC7524 : PLUME signature in wallets
â€¢ ERC7526 : Onchain NFT royalty enforcement
ERC7526 : Onchain NFT royalty enforcement
Stuff for developers
â€¢ HoleÅ¡ky testnet launched for staking, infrastructure & protocol testing Explorers: Etherscan ,
beaconcha.in & Otterscan 1000 holETH distributed to contract deployers (mainnet & Goerli testnet)
Faucets: pk910 PoW faucet & Etherscanâ€™s Blockscan chat Replacement for deprecated Goerli Use Sepolia
testnet for app layer testing
HoleÅ¡ky testnet launched for staking, infrastructure & protocol testing
â€¢ Explorers: Etherscan , beaconcha.in & Otterscan
Explorers: Etherscan , beaconcha.in & Otterscan
â€¢ 1000 holETH distributed to contract deployers (mainnet & Goerli testnet)
1000 holETH distributed to contract deployers (mainnet & Goerli testnet)
â€¢ Faucets: pk910 PoW faucet & Etherscanâ€™s Blockscan chat
Faucets: pk910 PoW faucet & Etherscanâ€™s Blockscan chat
â€¢ Replacement for deprecated Goerli
Replacement for deprecated Goerli
â€¢ Use Sepolia testnet for app layer testing
Use Sepolia testnet for app layer testing
â€¢ Remix v0.36.0 : uses ChatGPT to explain a function, generate documentation & explain compiler
errors, adds more quick fixes and support for Ephemery testnet
Remix v0.36.0 : uses ChatGPT to explain a function, generate documentation & explain compiler errors,
adds more quick fixes and support for Ephemery testnet
â€¢ Hardhat v2.17.4 : supports debug_traceCall
Hardhat v2.17.4 : supports debug_traceCall
â€¢ Branching Tree Technique examples : specification framework for writing structured Solidity tests
Branching Tree Technique examples : specification framework for writing structured Solidity tests
â€¢ Solmate (contract library) adds ERC6909 (minimal multi-token interface) implementation
Solmate (contract library) adds ERC6909 (minimal multi-token interface) implementation
â€¢ SSTORE gas: OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard avoids resetting to zero to maximize gas refund EVM uses
SSTORE current vs final value and not intermediate values for reduced gas cost
SSTORE gas:
â€¢ OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard avoids resetting to zero to maximize gas refund
OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard avoids resetting to zero to maximize gas refund
â€¢ EVM uses SSTORE current vs final value and not intermediate values for reduced gas cost
EVM uses SSTORE current vs final value and not intermediate values for reduced gas cost
â€¢ Comparison of borrowing protocol architectures : MakerDAO, Compound, Aave, Euler & Yield
Comparison of borrowing protocol architectures : MakerDAO, Compound, Aave, Euler & Yield
â€¢ Huffathon challenges: 1 , 2 , 3 & 4
Huffathon challenges: 1 , 2 , 3 & 4
â€¢ wagmi v2 alpha : TanStack Query support, connect multiple connectors, switch chains while
disconnected and EIP6963 support
wagmi v2 alpha : TanStack Query support, connect multiple connectors, switch chains while disconnected
and EIP6963 support
â€¢ ERC4337 (account abstraction): Permissionless.js : TypeScript library to interact with bundlers &
paymasters, built on viem Alchemyâ€™s Rundler : ERC4337 bundler in Rust
ERC4337 (account abstraction):
â€¢ Permissionless.js : TypeScript library to interact with bundlers & paymasters, built on viem
Permissionless.js : TypeScript library to interact with bundlers & paymasters, built on viem
â€¢ Alchemyâ€™s Rundler : ERC4337 bundler in Rust
Alchemyâ€™s Rundler : ERC4337 bundler in Rust
â€¢ Solidity Next.js starter v2 : uses Hardhat, viem, wagmi, Tailwind CSS & RainbowKit
Solidity Next.js starter v2 : uses Hardhat, viem, wagmi, Tailwind CSS & RainbowKit
â€¢ Ether binder beta, PHP utilities to interact with Ethereum, uses PHP 8.2
Ether binder beta, PHP utilities to interact with Ethereum, uses PHP 8.2
â€¢ Curta CTF Philosopher's Stone writeup
Curta CTF Philosopher's Stone writeup
â€¢ Guide to using Cryo & Polars for data analysis
Guide to using Cryo & Polars for data analysis
â€¢ Banteg: create heatmap of ERC20 transfers
Banteg: create heatmap of ERC20 transfers
â€¢ RareSkills: Circom tutorial
RareSkills: Circom tutorial
Security
â€¢ SEAL 911 members saved $200k from Dice9win mid exploit
SEAL 911 members saved $200k from Dice9win mid exploit
â€¢ GMX (DEX on Arbitrum) price skew vulnerability disclosed , fixed with $1M bounty paid
GMX (DEX on Arbitrum) price skew vulnerability disclosed , fixed with $1M bounty paid
Ecosystem
â€¢ Dankrad: Ethereum values need to be protected by the community , they are not automatically
guaranteed by economic incentives
Dankrad: Ethereum values need to be protected by the community , they are not automatically guaranteed
by economic incentives
â€¢ EF data collection grants , applications close October 23, wish list includes projects for XATU
(network monitoring), testnets and data collection
EF data collection grants , applications close October 23, wish list includes projects for XATU
â€¢ ERC4337 (account abstraction) adoption analysis : 687k wallets, 2M UserOps, majority of wallets used
5 times or less
ERC4337 (account abstraction) adoption analysis : 687k wallets, 2M UserOps, majority of wallets used 5
times or less
â€¢ ETHGlobal New York hackathon finalists
ETHGlobal New York hackathon finalists
Enterprise
â€¢ Bank of International Settlements Project Mariana : proof of concept for cross-border exchange of
wholesale CBDCs using AMMs on Sepolia testnet
Bank of International Settlements Project Mariana : proof of concept for cross-border exchange of
â€¢ Buenos Aires digital identity : QuarkID wallet can be used to claim birth & marriage certificates,
uses zkSync Era
Buenos Aires digital identity : QuarkID wallet can be used to claim birth & marriage certificates,
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 5.5 to 74.1 gwei, with 10.7 gwei average Negative issuance
currently at 20.9 gwei 7.9k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 5.5 to 74.1 gwei, with 10.7 gwei average
â€¢ Negative issuance currently at 20.9 gwei
Negative issuance currently at 20.9 gwei
â€¢ 7.9k ETH net issuance this week
7.9k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $1,569 - $1,684, currently $1668
ETHUSD : $1,569 - $1,684, currently $1668
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.062 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.062 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Arbitrum Odyssey relaunched, 7 week campaign for users to try apps & collect badges
Arbitrum Odyssey relaunched, 7 week campaign for users to try apps & collect badges
â€¢ Pudgy Toys : physical Pudgy Penguin plushies, sold in Walmart, licensing royalties shared with NFT
holders, purchasers can claim a Forever Pudgy on zkSync
Pudgy Toys : physical Pudgy Penguin plushies, sold in Walmart, licensing royalties shared with NFT
â€¢ Nouns DAO burn proposal : incentivize spending the treasury otherwise excess ETH can be burnt
Nouns DAO burn proposal : incentivize spending the treasury otherwise excess ETH can be burnt
â€¢ Paris Hilton promoting MareBear NFTs : Tamagotchis pets
Paris Hilton promoting MareBear NFTs : Tamagotchis pets
Job Listings
â€¢ Aave seek a UX Engineer and a Staff Rust Engineer
Aave seek a UX Engineer and a Staff Rust Engineer
â€¢ Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
â€¢ EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek a Technical Project Coordinator
EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek a Technical Project Coordinator
â€¢ ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit).Â Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ VanEck announced upcoming ETH futures ETF (EFUT)
VanEck announced upcoming ETH futures ETF (EFUT)
â€¢ Coinbase approved by Bermuda Monetary Authority to offer perpetual futures trading, non-US
Coinbase approved by Bermuda Monetary Authority to offer perpetual futures trading, non-US
â€¢ New York & Boston Feds: stablecoin flight to safety dynamics resemble money market funds
New York & Boston Feds: stablecoin flight to safety dynamics resemble money market funds
â€¢ Chase UK will decline crypto related payments
Chase UK will decline crypto related payments
General
â€¢ Exchange hacks: $200M for Mixin Network and $8M for HTX (formerly Huobi)
Exchange hacks: $200M for Mixin Network and $8M for HTX (formerly Huobi)
â€¢ Sigmabus : efficient computation of elliptic curve group operations in generic SNARK circuits
Sigmabus : efficient computation of elliptic curve group operations in generic SNARK circuits
â€¢ Naysayer proofs : accept proofs optimistically and only check when necessary
Naysayer proofs : accept proofs optimistically and only check when necessary

@evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
